price: Onlar dedilər: “Allaha and olsun! Siz bizim bu yerlərə fitnə-fəsad törətmək üçün gəlmədiyimizi bilirsiniz. Biz oğru da deyilik”.
arabic: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ لَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتُم مَّا جِئۡنَا لِنُفۡسِدَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا كُنَّا سَٰرِقِينَ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū tal-lahi laqad ʿalim'tum mā ji'nā linuf'sida fī al-arḍi wamā kunnā sāriqīna
